data.name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Michelangelo
data.detailed_description:
COWABUNGA! Here is another car straight from the world of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, inspired by Michelangelo himself! With its green body, orange mask and a legendary nunchuks rear wing, it will help you carve your name in history.

Get ready for super fun races: with HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Michelangelo, overtaking your opponents will be a joke! And even if he is known as the life of the pizza party, when it comes to racing Michelangelo is certainly a serious contender.

Add this awesome vehicle to your collection and don't miss all the vehicles inspired by your favorite series!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

data.short_description: Collect this Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles inspired racing car and carve your name in history. Overtaking your opponents will be a joke! When it comes to racing Michelangelo is certainly a serious contender.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
